name: The Jernel Deep
description:
After nearly destroying the Earth's surface, humanity retreated to New Cradle, an underwater city on the bottom of The Jernel Deep, leaving an army of robots to cleanup after them.

Now the planet's surface is clean once again and it's your mission to bring the news to the humans.

Your path lies into the Jernel Deep.

All calculations say that its impossible to reach New Cradle with just a submarine built of leftover scraps and waste, but you can't go against your programming.

Good luck.

HOW TO PLAY:

Your task is to protect the submarine from leechers, which will try to attach to it and breach its hull.

LMB click on stations to move and activate them.

A/D - guns rotation (when respective station is active).

Space - shoot, discharge electric coil (depending on which station is active).

RMB to pan the camera.

Mouse wheel to zoom in or out.

NOTE:

It's impossible to reach New Cradle in the current state of the project, but you're more than welcome (not to mention obligated by your programming) to try! Post your results and feedback in the comments!
